title: So, How Did You Do? | Think About It from the Other Person’s Perspective
description:
Ryan talks about the lasting impact that COVID-19 has had on the world around us, and reads this week’s meditation from The Daily Stoic Journal.

For a limited time, UCAN is offering you 30% off on your first order when you use code STOIC at checkout Just go to UCAN.CO/STOIC

Sign up for the 14-day Daily Stoic Alive Time Challenge to take control of your life and get the most out of your time.

Sign up for the Daily Stoic email: https://DailyStoic.com/email

Follow us: Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, TikTok, and Facebook

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
